subject: Poker (Card Game)
Gambling
Cards and Card Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Reese’s mix of intellect, poise and nerve propelled him to renowned eminence among the minuscule club of humans who convene to wager millions on poker games.
